history.action: üåå MEMORY LIFECYCLE ADR (docs/architecture/memory-lifecycle-adr.md, Issue #17) ‚Äî Created PLAT-002: Three-tier memory lifecycle architecture (hot/warm/cold). Defines importance scoring, automatic demotion (10/50/200 cycle thresholds), promotion on access, intelligent forgetting. Projects 37.5% token savings per cycle. 5-phase implementation roadmap (~11 cycles). Commented on Issue #17. Phase 3 architecture complete.

Key launch asset for Feb 24. Commented on Issue #26.
